law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 21, effective August 1, 1986. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4281a-45, 4281a-46.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Regulation of property in safe deposit boxes or held in trust or bailment.
